trans-unit.source: An activity used to explicitly invoke the compensation handler of a <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un'attività utilizzata per richiamare in modo esplicito il gestore compensazione di un <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Compensate"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Compensate"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.WorkflowModel.InArgument%601> that contains the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Compensate"></xref> activity.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref:System.WorkflowModel.InArgument%601> che contiene il <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>per questo <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Compensate"> </xref> attività.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>

trans-unit.source: When the Target of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> is specified, the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> activity explicitly invokes the compensation handler of <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>, which returns the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>.
trans-unit.target: Quando la destinazione di <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>viene specificato, l' <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate>attività richiama in modo esplicito il gestore compensazione di <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>, che restituisce <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>

trans-unit.source: When the Target of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> is not specified, the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> activity invokes the default compensation for any child <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> activities in the reverse order of successful completion.
trans-unit.target: Quando la destinazione del <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>non viene specificato, il <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate>attività richiama la compensazione predefinita per qualsiasi elemento figlio <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>attività nell'ordine inverso del completamento.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.> InvalidOperationException?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True is thrown if the Target refers to a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> that was previously confirmed or compensated.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.>InvalidOperationException? qualifyHint = False / autoUpgrade = True viene generata se la destinazione fa riferimento a un <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>che in precedenza è stato confermato o compensato.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> </xref:System.>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è di sola lettura in fase di esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is raised.
trans-unit.target: Se il valore è impostato in fase di esecuzione, un <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>viene generato.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.WorkflowModel.InArgument%601> that contains the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationHandle> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.Compensate"></xref>.
